description: Fears had been expressed Irish teachers could face costs if students were not happy with results.
title: Coronavirus: Irish teachers given legal assurance over predicted grades
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish teachers given legal assurance over predicted grades - BBC News
maintext: However, following the talks on Friday, Asti said: "This strengthening of the indemnity will ensure that a teacher will not have to employ her/ his own legal team to defend herself/ himself and run the risk of incurring large irrecoverable costs and expenses."
